EmailInputEdit: Please make sure to adjust all the proper instructions in the Case Setup step, before scanning and post-processing, to avoid corrupting the case.
Issue: regarding send step missing or grayed-out, so you are unable to send cases.
Probing Questions (Add Info):
How long has been Happening this issue?
Is happening with all the cases or just this one?
Have you done an update on the software?
Have anything changed on the network or the commputer lin the last days?
Do you have more scanners?
How many computer do you use?
RC: running a repair installation, after that you were able to see the send step and send the case successfully.
Solution: some modules appeared as incompatible in Unite software, causing the send step missing.
Step 2: Check for updates of TRIOS module
Step 3: Check modules at app management and appeared as not compatible
Step 4: services stopped, and a Repair runned of Unite software and send step is now available
